name: DEPRECATED_AS_GCM_CEDM_getImportDataForWriteBasedOnRecordType
description: Rule to get the imported data based on the record type
sail_code:
a!flatten(
  a!localVariables(
    local!uuid: rule!AS_GCM_filterRecords(
      records: rule!AS_GCM_CEDM_typeConfigMapForDataMigration(),
      field: "recordType",
      value: ri!recordType
    )[1].uuid,
    rule!AS_GCM_filterRecords(
      records: ri!importData.records,
      field: "uuid",
      value: local!uuid
    ).updatedData
  )
)
